title: Detail
description: Information about a detailing arrangement where federal staff from one agency are assigned to work at another

id.description: A unique slug for referring to this detailing agreement

signed_date.description: The date the detailing agreement was executed

start_date.description: The date the detailing agreement  is effective from

end_date.description: The date the detailing agreement is effective to

from.description: The agency that the staff is being detailed from

to.description: The agency or agencies that the staff is being detailed to

max_people.description: The maximum number of staff that are covered in this detail agreement

reimbursed.description: Will the agency reimburse the detailing agency for the work?

reimbursement_amount.desciption: The amount of the reimbursement and duration

source.description: A link to where this document was sourced from

file.description: The name of the local file in agreements with the body of the MOU
